General.Name: ShenZhen Special Economic Zone Real Estate & Properties Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Real Estate & Properties (Group) Co., Ltd. develops and sells real estate properties in the People's Republic of China. It also engages in various activities, including property leasing and management, retail merchandising and trade, hotel, equipment installation and maintenance, construction, interior decoration, etc. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China. Shenzhen Special Economic Zone Real Estate & Properties (Group) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shenzhen Investment Holdings Co., Ltd.

3.Name: Yanjun  Qiao
3.Title: Chief of Accounting & Head of Financial Department
